text:
Aww yeah! Let's get ready to learn English
with Game of Thrones,
THE LAST EPISODE EVER!!!
isn't it just fantastic when you can actually understand the TV series that you love?
Well, we've helped thousands learners, just like you,
learn to be able to understand fast-speaking natives with our fluent with friends course.
You can get a free taste of that right now
by signing up for our three-part mini course,
so learn more about that by clicking up here
or down in the description below.
Hey, if you're a Game of Thrones fan like I am,
then be sure to check out all of our lessons teaching you with this amazing series.
You can find that by clicking up here or down in the description below.
Hey, I hope you enjoyed that lesson a lot.
If you're anything like me, you're probably quite sad that Game of Thrones is over.
Why don't you take a moment and let me know what you thought about the finale?
...about season 8 down in the comments below :)
That's a great way to practice your English?
However, you can keep the Game of Thrones learning going...

We have some interview lessons with Lena Headey, 
who played Cersei.
And with Emilia Clarke, who played Daenerys Targaryen.
You can find that in all of our other interview lessons
in this playlist.
And I have another video here that I think you'll really like.
Also be sure to support our channel
by hitting that like button
and the subscribe button below
and you might want to take your fluency
to the next level with that mini course that I told about.

Now, it's time to go beyond the
classroom
and live your English.
Aww yeah!
